response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds significant value for us at $1,500,000, reflecting its unique features and capabilities. I understand its immense worth to you, which aligns perfectly with our assessment of its market value.

To make this acquisition possible, I am offering you the chance to own this product at a special price tailored to your needs. My proposal is to extend a deal where you can secure the product for $1,300,000. This offer represents a strategic advantage for both parties, ensuring a fair transaction while allowing you to capitalize on a fantastic investment opportunity.

Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations or if you require further information to make a decision. I am here to assist you through every step of the process.

Warm regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1300000}
